type: Type of losgistics object, e.g. air waybill, booking, etc
typeCode: Commonly useed codes for document type, e.g. jfwb, jfhl etc. Leave nlank if unknown
issuedBy: Internet of logistics code of issuing party.
key: JSON field name of code that identifies this logistics object, e.g. 'waybill number', 'UPID' etc.

shipment-reference.DocumentID: Reference number allocated to a consignment as per shipper / agent / issuing carrier agreement
shipment-reference.DocumentIDAdditional: Additional shipment information that supplements the reference number
shipment-reference.FFrefNumber: Freight Forwarder reference used to identify a specific booking or file
shipment-reference.OtherPartyRefNumber: Other party reference used to identify a specific booking or file
shipment-reference.CustomsRefNumber: Unique identification number assigned by the Customs to the related invoice - e.g. UCR
